summary.span: 提供 類別的執行個體 (Instance) 集合。

span.span: Provides a collection of instances of the class.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A表示搜尋 HTTP 傳輸的 MIME 文字模式。A represents a MIME text pattern for which an HTTP transmission will be searched. 如需指定 XML Web service 的通訊協定的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). 如需 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格： http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用的屬性和方法所公開的`MimeTextMatchCollection`類別。The following example demonstrates the use of the properties and methods exposed by the `MimeTextMatchCollection` class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已在集合中的項目數等於集合的容量，容量加倍會插入新項目之前，會自動重新配置內部陣列。If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`參數等於，則`match`參數新增至結尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `match` parameter is added to the end of the . 向下移動以容納新的項目插入點之後的項目。The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples 下列範例示範 `Insert` 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the `Insert` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間成正比。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 請遵循移除的項目`MimeTextMatch`向上移動以佔用空出的位置。The elements that follow the removed `MimeTextMatch` move up to occupy the vacated spot. ## Examples 下列範例示範 `Remove` 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the `Remove` method.
